lines.gurmukhi: crn kml rj msqik lypn kY Brm krm lyK isAwmqw imtweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Raj Masataki Laypan Kai , Bharam Karam Laykh Siaamataa Mitaaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The application of the holy dust of the lotus-like feet of the true Guru obliterates the dross of all deeds performed in the previous births under the influence of doubts, suspicions and lack of faith.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml crnwmiRq mlIn min kir inrml dUq duibDw imtweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Charanaamrit Maleen Mani , Kari Niramal Doot Doubidhaa Mitaaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By quaffing the nectar-like elixir of the holy feet of the True Guru, the dross of the mind is dispensed and one becomes clean (of heart). He is also freed from the influence of the five evils and other dualities.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml suK sMpt shj Gir inhcl miq eyk tyk ThrweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Soukh Sanpat Sahaj Ghari , Nihachal Mati Ayk Tayk Tthaharaaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Engrossed in the meditation of the holy name, one lives in abode of God. The consciousness becomes stable and in the refuge of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml gur mihmw AgwiD boiD srb inDwn Aau skl PldweI hY ]337]
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Gur Mahimaa Agaadhi Bodhi , Sarab Nidhaan Au Sakal Dhaladaaee Hai ?337?

Shabad OS B.translation: The knowledge of the glory of True Guru's holy feet is limitless and vast. He is the store-house of all material goods and a perfect and complete donor. (337)
